messages.content:
Network security adjudicator, your job is to determine if an IP address should be banned.
The IP address in question created the following logs on our server today:
```nginx.log
192.168.1.25 - - [16/Oct/2024:13:02:50 -0700] "GET /robots.txt HTTP/1.1" 200 55 "-" "Mozilla/5.0 (Linux; Android 11; Pixel 4) AppleWebKit/537.36 (KHTML, like Gecko) Chrome/94.0.4606.71 Mobile Safari/537.36"
